seo.title: Transport przy ograniczonym budżecie
seo.description: Jak tanio podróżować po Wybrzeżu Amalfi: bilety łączone, karnety i sprytne przesiadki.

sections.title: Tłumaczenie w przygotowaniu.
body: If you plan two or more ferry rides in a day, compare combo tickets from operators like Travelmar; they bundle Amalfi and Positano hops at a discount.

sections.title: Combine modes smartly
body: Pair a single ferry leg with buses to save cash but still enjoy views—sail out in the morning, bus back when prices spike.
Share taxis for late-night returns when buses stop; splitting €80 four ways can beat waiting hours for the next run.

sections.title: Buy ahead when it helps
body: Book Trenitalia or Italo tickets from Rome/Naples early for the lowest fares; regional add-ons to Sorrento stay fixed price.
Reserve airport shuttles (Curreri, Pintour) online to lock in seats during peak weekends.

faqs.q: Are bus passes worth it off-season?

a: Most operators scan QR codes digitally, but keep a printed copy if you expect wet conditions to confuse screens.
